      Closes database.
      private void copyDatabase​(java.io.File dbFile)
      Copies the database.
      void downloadWordsToLearn()
      Copies words from table "words" to "wordsToLearn" if the table "wordsToLearn" is empty
      android.database.Cursor getLearnedWordsCursor()
      gets the cursor for those words from "wordsToTest" table which date for revising is more or equals current time in random order.

      gets the cursor for all the words from "wordsToLearn" table.

      Creates database or opens it (if it already exists)

      Adds two rows into "wordsToTest" table: where the word is english and the translation is russian and vice versa.
      void setWordUnlearned​(LearnedWord word)
      Deletes rows from "wordsToTest" table that refers to word that was not repeated

    • Method Detail

      • openOrCreate

        public void openOrCreate()
        Creates database or opens it (if it already exists)

      • downloadWordsToLearn

        public void downloadWordsToLearn()
        Copies words from table "words" to "wordsToLearn" if the table "wordsToLearn" is empty

      • setWordLearned

        public void setWordLearned​(UnlearnedWord word)
        Adds two rows into "wordsToTest" table: where the word is english and the translation is russian and vice versa. Deletes the row with the word from "wordsToLearn" table.
        Parameters:
        word - word essence that was learned

      • addWordToTest

        private void addWordToTest​(int sourceId,
                           int orderFlag)
        Adds row into the "wordsToTest" table. Sets dateRepeat to current time.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id of word in "words" table
        orderFlag - if orderFlag == 0 then the word is english and the translation is russian if orderFlag == 1 then the word is russian and the translation is english

      • getUnlearnedWordsCursor

        public android.database.Cursor getUnlearnedWordsCursor()
        gets the cursor for all the words from "wordsToLearn" table.
        Returns:
        the cursor for the unlearned words

      • getLearnedWordsCursor

        public android.database.Cursor getLearnedWordsCursor()
        gets the cursor for those words from "wordsToTest" table which date for revising is more or equals current time in random order.
        Returns:
        the cursor for the matching words

      • setWordUnlearned

        public void setWordUnlearned​(LearnedWord word)
        Deletes rows from "wordsToTest" table that refers to word that was not repeated
        Parameters:
        word - word essence that was not repeated

      • changeRepeatInfo

        public void changeRepeatInfo​(LearnedWord word)
        Sets repeatNumber increased by one and date for the next revision accordingly.
        Parameters:
        word - word essence that was repeated
        See Also:
        Returns the revision time based on repeat number.

      • closeDatabase

        public void closeDatabase()
        Closes database.

      • copyDatabase

        private void copyDatabase​(java.io.File dbFile)
        Copies the database.
        Parameters:
        dbFile - path to database
